page.shortlink: api extension namespace mongodb class get record method
page.description: Gets a document db record using 'id'.

argument.name: id
argument.description: _id for a record (_id is the unique field that Mongo guarentees).

section.example: dim mongo as extension::MongoDB = extension::MongoDB::Create("mongodb://localhost:27017","TestDatabase","flowers") dim id as c = "6065f833dbef84456ce731de" json = mongo.GetRecord(id)

description.p: Get a specific document that we know the id of. In this example this is hardcoded, usually this would be stored somewhere and treated like a foriegn key.
